Meet Hope

Meet Hope! Hope is new to the choir this year and has been loving every minute of it! She's currently in her first year of French Education at the University of Regina.

She's been really enjoying all of the music so far and loves performing with such a talented group, and loves enjoying a cup of tea while chatting with other choir members and getting to know them during break time!

Image courtesy of Andrea Norberg Photography
